import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserInformation=_ref=>{let{userID}=_ref;const[userData,setUserData]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const fetchUserData=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/users/fetch-user',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({id:userID})// Need to make the user login and keep track of his ID
